description: '''Méringue''' ({{IPA|fr|meʁɛ̃ɡ}}; {{langx|ht|mereng}}), also called '''''méringue lente''''' or '''''méringue de salon''''' (''slow'' or ''salon'' méringue), is a [[dance music]] and national symbol in [[Haiti]]. It is a string-based style played on the [[guitar]], horn section, piano, and other string instruments unlike the [[accordion]]-based ''[[merengue music|merengue]]'', and is generally sung in [[Haitian Creole]] and [[French language|French]], as well as in English and [[Spanish language|Spanish]].

mixes.note: I'm not sure if this is pure méringue. Open to suggestions.
